name: Get_Currency
response_summary: The API response provides information about different currencies used in property listings. The first entry is labeled as "Property currency" and includes multiple symbols such as the Euro (€), Dollar ($), and Pound (£), with its code listed as "hotel_currency." The second entry is the Argentine Peso, represented by the code "ARS" and the symbol "AR$." The third entry is the Australian Dollar, identified by the code "AUD" and the symbol "AUD." This data helps in understanding the currency options available for property transactions.
enhance_func_desc: This API is useful for property booking platforms and financial applications. It retrieves a list of supported currencies, including their codes and symbols, to facilitate transactions and pricing displays. The response includes details like currency symbols (e.g., €, $, £) and codes (e.g., ARS, AUD), ensuring accurate currency representation for global property listings. No input parameters are required.

name.description: The display name of the currency (e.g., 'Property currency', 'Argentine Peso', 'Australian Dollar').

encodedSymbol.description: The HTML-encoded symbol representation of the currency (e.g., '€£US$', 'AR$', 'AUD').

symbol.description: The standard symbol representation of the currency (e.g., '€$£', 'AR$', 'AUD').

response_desc_list.name: name
response_desc_list.description: The display name of the currency (e.g., 'Property currency', 'Argentine Peso', 'Australian Dollar').

response_desc_list.name: encodedSymbol
response_desc_list.description: The HTML-encoded symbol representation of the currency (e.g., '€£US$', 'AR$', 'AUD').

response_desc_list.name: symbol
